title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 Point

  • One point is earned for stating that as more of a good is consumed, utility increases at a diminishing rate.
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • One point is earned for stating that as more of a good is consumed, utility increases at a diminishing rate.

The student earns all of the following points:

  • One point is earned for stating that as more of a good is consumed, utility increases at a diminishing rate.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 Point

  • One point is earned for stating that MUx/Px = MUy/Py.
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • One point is earned for stating that MUx/Px = MUy/Py.

The student earns all of the following points:

  • One point is earned for stating that MUx/Px = MUy/Py.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 Point

  • One point is earned for stating that MUx =10. (10/$2 = 15/$3)
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • One point is earned for stating that MUx = 10. (10/$2 = 15/$3)

The student earns all of the following points:

  • One point is earned for stating that MUx = 10. (10/$2 = 15/$3)

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
4 Points

  • One point is earned for stating less X.

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.

  • One point is earned for stating less X.

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • One point is earned for stating less X.

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.

  • One point is earned for stating less X.

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.

The student earns three of the following points:

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.

  • One point is earned for stating less X.

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.

The student earns all of the following points:

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.

  • One point is earned for stating more Y.
